links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
mathematica: Select[Table[Prime[n], {n, 1000}], First[IntegerDigits[#]] == 4 &]Flatten[Table[Prime[Range[PrimePi[4 * 10^n] + 1, PrimePi[5 * 10^n]]], {n, 3}]] (* _Alonso del Arte_, Jul 19 2014 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(10^4) | Intseq(p)[#Intseq(p)] eq 4]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Jul 19 2014
author: _Felice Russo_
